meta.name: Goetia - 72 Demons Registry
meta.description: Sacred registry of the 72 demons from the Lesser Key of Solomon
meta.source: Ars Goetia via traditional grimoire sources

55.name: Orobas
55.virtue: Revealing past and future, granting dignities

72.name: Andromalius
72.virtue: Retrieving stolen goods and punishing thieves

healing_integration.trauma_informed_approach: Demons as shadow aspects requiring integration, not banishment
healing_integration.ifs_compatibility: Each demon represents an exiled part seeking healing
healing_integration.balance_protocol: Always invoke corresponding angel for healing integration
healing_integration.chapel_work: Use stone-grimoire shadow chambers for safe shadow work
healing_integration.safety_first: Never work with demons without protection seals and angel balance

numerological_patterns.chapel_integration: Each demon paired with angel in corresponding Octagram Hall shadow chambers

protection_protocols.healing_intention: Approach as integration work, not domination
protection_protocols.trauma_safety: Ensure emotional safety and support systems
protection_protocols.nd_accommodations: Respect sensory sensitivities in ritual work

integration.angel_balance: Perfect 72:72 angel-demon balance for complete lattice
integration.chapel_chambers: Stone-grimoire shadow chambers for safe demon work
